text: File:Cathédrale Notre-Dame de Nîmes.Elefant of Nîmes was a medieval bishop coadjutor of the Diocese of Nîmes from 1066,Léon Ménard, Histoire civile, ecclésiastique et littéraire de la ville de Nîmes, Nimes, Clavel-Ballivet, (1873) , p. 151-154. List of Nimes Bishops. He was coadjudicator for his first 11 years with Frotaire II, sole bishop for 4 years and then shared the see with Pierre I. Ermangaud for his last four years.Léon Ménard, Histoire civile, ecclésiastique et littéraire de la ville de Nîmes, Nimes, Clavel-Ballivet, (1873), p. 151-154. Roman Catholic Diocese of Nîmes == See also == *Catholic Church in France ==References== Category:11th-century bishops Category:Bishops of Nîmes
title: Eléfant of Nîmes
